summary: Got bored. Started to overhaul the Blades.
descriptionHtml:
After finishing the main quest line, I always thought to myself "I wonder if I could make the Blades my own personal army", well when I'm done with this mod, you'll be able too, and so will I.

[u]Being made now[/u]
[list=1]
[*]New war room
[*]Exterior defenses
[*]New low and high ranking quarters
[*]Room for the dragonborn
[*]Bathhouse with a hidden twist
[/list]

[u]On list to be started[/u]
[list=1]
[*]New armory, w/ smithy
[*]New radiant quests
[*]New mage-type blades armor*
[*]New mage-type spells
[*]New questline bringing the blades back to their former glory
[/list]

[b][u]If you think you could make armors/weapons for this mod please contact me[/u][/b]
[b][u]If you have any ideas or notices any glitches are clashes cause by this mod, please contact me[/u][/b]
author: Watchtower52
